row1.title: Dubai Expo 2020 (now held in 2021 due to COVID-19)
row1.description: A world exposition held in Dubai, UAE, showcasing innovation
row1.manpower: Required a large workforce for construction, event management, hospitality, security, transportation, and various support services.

row1.title: King Abdullah Economic City (KAEC), Saudi Arabia
row1.description: A mega-development project initiated by the Saudi government to diversify the economy and create jobs.
row1.manpower: Involved construction, infrastructure development, manufacturing, logistics, and service industries, requiring a significant workforce.

row1.title: Qatar 2022 FIFA World Cup
row1.description: Qatar hosted the FIFA World Cup in 2022, requiring extensive infrastructure development, stadium construction, transportation systems, and hospitality services.
row1.manpower: Demand for skilled and unskilled labor across various sectors, including construction, engineering, hospitality, transportation, and event management.

row2.title: Yas Island Development, Abu Dhabi, UAE
row2.description: A major leisure and entertainment destination in Abu Dhabi, featuring theme parks, hotels, malls, and residential communities.
row2.manpower: Large-scale construction projects, hospitality services, retail operations, and event management, requiring a diverse workforce.

row2.title: Doha Metro Project, Qatar
row2.description: A multi-billion-dollar project to develop an integrated metro system in Doha, Qatar, ahead of the 2022 FIFA World Cup.
row2.manpower: Required skilled labor for tunneling, construction, engineering, project management, and operations across multiple phases of development.

row2.title: Red Sea Project, Saudi Arabia
row2.description: A tourism and hospitality project along the Red Sea coast of Saudi Arabia, aimed at developing luxury resorts, cultural attractions, and nature reserves.
row2.manpower: Involved construction, landscaping, hospitality, environmental conservation, and tourism services, requiring a large workforce.

row3.title: Abu Dhabi Vision 2030
row3.description: Abu Dhabi's long-term economic development plan aimed at diversifying the economy, promoting innovation, and creating sustainable growth.
row3.manpower: Various initiatives across sectors such as renewable energy, technology, healthcare, education, and infrastructure development, requiring skilled professionals and laborers.

row3.title: Neom Project, Saudi Arabia
row3.description: A futuristic city development project in Saudi Arabia, aiming to create a sustainable and technologically advanced urban center.
row3.manpower: Involved infrastructure projects, healthcare initiatives, education reforms, and investment in various sectors, creating job opportunities across different industries.

row3.title: Kuwait National Development Plan (New Kuwait 2035)
row3.description: Kuwait's strategic development plan aimed at diversifying the economy, improving infrastructure, and enhancing public services.
row3.manpower: Involved infrastructure projects, healthcare initiatives, education reforms, and investment in various sectors, creating job opportunities across different industries.
